mapper.sql: select dsv.id as dsv_id, dataset_id, owner_id, version_name, version_tag, version_meta, storage_path, dsv.created_time as dsv_created_time, dsv.modified_time as dsv_modified_time, u.id as user_id, u.user_name, u.created_time as user_created_time, u.user_enabled, r.id as role_id, r.role_name, r.role_name_en from dataset_version as dsv, user_info as u, user_role as r where owner_id = u.id and r.id = u.role_id
mapper.insert: insert into dataset_version (dataset_id, owner_id, version_name, version_tag, version_meta, storage_path) select dataset_id, owner_id, version_name, version_tag, version_meta, storage_path from dataset_version where id = #{dsVersionId}

insert into dataset_version (dataset_id, owner_id, version_name, version_tag, version_meta, storage_path) values(#{datasetId}, #{ownerId}, #{versionName}, #{versionTag}, #{versionMeta}, #{storagePath})
mapper.update: update dataset_version set version_tag = #{versionTag} where id = #{id}
